title: Mila Kunis Looks Miserable Amid Demi Moore's Tell-All About Ashton Kutcher
text:
Ashton Kutcher has been in the headlines for the past week as his sex life with ex-wife Demi Moore was revealed in her memoir ... and it looks like the stress has taken a toll on Mila Kunis.

Kunis was seen Monday morning in Beverly Hills, and was trying to keep a low profile with a hoodie pulled down over her head.





The wife, and mother of Kutcher's children, wasn't in a cheery mood but did seek comfort in a friend, as she was seen in a long embrace with a mystery woman.

The 36-year-old former star of "That 70's Show" has not commented on the revelations by Demi Moore, which are coming to light in the "Striptease" star's new book, "Inside Out."

In her memoir, Moore comes clean that she and her ex-husband engaged in multiple threesomes during their marriage, which she claims were at the behest of Kutcher.

She also claims to have given up 20-years of sobriety to party with him during the marriage, and admits, "I wanted to show him how great and fun I could be."

Moore claims that the threesomes led to infidelity in the marriage, and that it blurred the boundaries of the former couple.

The nail in the coffin for Moore and Kutcher, back in 2011, apparently came after he cheated on her during his "That 70's Show" co-star Danny Masterson's bachelor party.
description: things can't be good at home
